name: Ellie's adventure
description:
Ellie's adventure is a platformer game about the two stuffed animals Ellie and PB.

There are seven levels (not including the tutorial) that the player must go thru to win, there are 64 toonies (Canadian two dollar coin) for you to collect. Can you collect them all?

Enemys Ducker

The Ducker is an enemy that between to points (only implemented as platform sweeper) and kills the player upon contact.

Ducker sprite-sheet Waterdrop

The waterdrop is used as a boss in level 3 and as a hazard in some of the following levels.

The waterdrop finds the closed player in a 5-10 tile radius and chases it

Waterdrop sprite-sheet Pipe

Pipes spawn waterdrops

pipe sprite-sheet Controls

as I am an idiot I forgot to explain all the controls in game,

  • F1 switches between keyboard and N64 controller (or any controller you prefer)
  • F2 switches between 1. Ellie cam, 2. PB cam, and 3. Centered cam
  • F3 toggles god mode on the development version
  • F4 Changes the background on the earlier levels (the use a non-compatible tile-set)
Updates and sequels?

If five or more people want it I will do an update and for a full squeal it would be a combination of personal motivation, income, and support.

All of my low quality "assets" are free to be reused other than Ellie
